name: Allison Of Astra: Allison Doesn't Go Hawaiian (S1 E2)
name_original: Allison Of Astra: Allison Doesn't Go Hawaiian (S1 E2)
description:
Can Allison stop a killer robot uprising on the island nation of Napaj? Or did she cause the upsiring in the first place? It's hard to keep track. Meanwhile, it's intern Niki's first day working for Matsumoto Roboworks, and he's just trying to keep his sanity through it all.

Contains a full Allison Of Astra adventure plus the creative stamp program MESS MAKER!

Try before you buy: play the browser version here!
